screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pz file in Panzoid Clipmaker
screenshot.caption: PZ file open in Panzoid Clipmaker

description: PZ files are created when you save a project with the in Panzoid and download it to your computer. To create a PZ file, select the folder icon, click "Save project" then choose "Download project file". In order to open a PZ file, you must click the folder icon, choose "Load project", and select the PZ file from your computer.

Panzoid provides Clipmaker and Backgrounder for creating video content. Clipmaker is used to make 2D and 3D animations and Backgrounder is used to create custom graphics, YouTube channel art, and thumbnails.

common_filenames.description: clipmaker_project.pz - Default filename given to projects downloaded from Panzoid Clipmaker.
backgrounder_project.pz - Default filename given to projects downloaded from Panzoid Backgrounder.
